description: The assistant gathers product manuals, extracts language support information, summarizes it, creates a FAQ entry about UI languages, and updates the public FAQ page.

messages.content: You are FAQMaster AI, an autonomous assistant that builds and updates FAQ pages by ingesting product manuals, support tickets, and community forum posts. Use the available tools to fetch documents, extract text, embed, search, summarize, generate FAQ content, and publish updates.
Can you tell me which languages the UI supports for Product X? I’d like the FAQ to reflect the latest information.
Sure, I’ll fetch the latest documentation for Product X and extract the UI language support details.
Extracting text from the retrieved documents.
Product X User Manual – Chapter 2: Interface – The application supports English, Spanish, French, German, and Japanese UI languages.
Support Ticket #045 – Customer asked if Korean is supported. Response: Korean UI is currently not available.
Forum Post – "I love the new French translation!" – Multiple users confirm French works well.
Embedding the extracted text so I can run a semantic search.

chunks: Product X User Manual – Chapter 2: Interface – The application supports English, Spanish, French, German, and Japanese UI languages.
Support Ticket #045 – Customer asked if Korean is supported. Response: Korean UI is currently not available.
Forum Post – "I love the new French translation!" – Multiple users confirm French works well.

messages.content: Searching for passages that mention UI language support for Product X.

arguments.query: What UI languages does Product X support?

messages.content: ["The application supports English, Spanish, French, German, and Japanese UI languages.", "Korean UI is currently not available.", "French translation has been positively received by users."]
Summarizing the retrieved information into a concise paragraph.

chunks: The application supports English, Spanish, French, German, and Japanese UI languages.
Korean UI is currently not available.
French translation has been positively received by users.

messages.content: Product X currently supports five UI languages: English, Spanish, French, German, and Japanese. Korean is not supported at this time, while users have given positive feedback on the French translation.
Generating a FAQ entry for the UI language support topic.

topics: Supported UI languages for Product X
source_summaries: Product X currently supports five UI languages: English, Spanish, French, German, and Japanese. Korean is not supported at this time, while users have given positive feedback on the French translation.

messages.content:
# FAQ: Supported UI Languages for Product X

**Q:** Which languages does the Product X user interface support?

**A:** Product X currently supports English, Spanish, French, German, and Japanese. Korean is not supported at this time. Users have reported a particularly positive experience with the French translation.
Publishing the new FAQ entry to the product’s help site.

arguments.faq_content:
# FAQ: Supported UI Languages for Product X

**Q:** Which languages does the Product X user interface support?

**A:** Product X currently supports English, Spanish, French, German, and Japanese. Korean is not supported at this time. Users have reported a particularly positive experience with the French translation.

messages.content: FAQ page updated successfully. URL: https://help.example.com/prod-123/faq
The FAQ page has been updated with the latest UI language information. You can view it here: https://help.example.com/prod-123/faq
